name: Happy Turtle Studios
tagline: Where turtle happiness is more than just a dream...
body:
### Welcome to Happy Turtle Studios
We like turtles.  Turtles make us happy.

### What?
We have exciting products coming soon.

### Why?
Because we want to make you happy, too.

![images of happy turtles](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/happyturtle/happyturtle.github.io/master/images/logos/happy-turtles-many.png)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
